transcript: buying something to impress other people always feels empty because they're not the ones with it 99% of the time I quickly feel like a fraud in that kind of situation and I also feel very weak when I do something for other people because it makes me feel vulnerable which I don't like cuz then it makes me feel like my subjective well-being is based on their interpretation or their projection of who they think I am and I don't like that eliminating those things almost to be fair to a degree going in complete contrast to that and hoping people underestimate me to some degree I'm asking for it because I look the way I look right there's not a lot of wealthy private equity guys who walk around in a beater and a faded trucker hat
